channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 西班牙阻止萨姆-奥特曼的眼球扫描风险投资公司 Worldcoin
item.description:
Spain blocks Sam Altman’s eyeball-scanning venture Worldcoin https://t.co/THiU9YX0QC

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）宣布将新的预算预支贷款的还款期从 12 个月延长至 24 个月。
item.description:
UK chancellor Jeremy Hunt has announced an extension in the repayment period for new budgeting advance loans from 12 months to 24 months.

He said the measure was designed to help people 'falling into debt'https://t.co/AhxlumCEDy pic.twitter.com/mVgfpG8Ojm

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 欧盟削弱供应链法以安抚德国和意大利
item.description:
EU waters down supply chain law to placate Germany and Italy https://t.co/KbYMFJmGzW

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 由于今年晚些时候将举行大选，今天的英国预算值得关注。点击此处关注我们的现场报道
item.description:
With an election due later this year, today's UK Budget is one to watch. Follow our live coverage here https://t.co/AhxlumCEDy

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 秘密的非特朗普选民 "之谜--来自 @SpiegelPeter 的专栏。这位美国前总统在 "超级星期二 "的表现仍然低于民调机构的预测
item.description:
The mystery of the ‘secret non-Trump voter’ - column from @SpiegelPeter. The former US president continued to underperform the pollsters’ predictions on Super Tuesday https://t.co/K8YH888fiw pic.twitter.com/wyxSXCrF5u

— Tony Tassell (@TonyTassell) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国高收入者的可支配收入将出现有史以来的最大降幅。这可能是现任保守党政府的最后一份预算案，造成这一严峻背景的主要原因是什么？
item.description:
The UK’s higher earners are on track for the biggest fall in their disposable income on record. What are the key reasons for the harsh backdrop to what could be the current Conservative government’s final Budget? https://t.co/eiDbOmCeip pic.twitter.com/iwU4D1XaYb

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 从开放的商业投资和增长环境到应对高利率的压力，英国商业团体在英国政府公布预算之前都在游说什么？
item.description:
From an open environment for business investment and growth to tackling the strain of high interest rates, what are British business groups lobbying for ahead of the UK government's Budget announcement?

Find out in our live coverage: https://t.co/AhxlumCEDy pic.twitter.com/83w26ZHyFx

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 杰里米-亨特重施 "2 便士 "伎俩有望带来政治上的得失
item.description:
Jeremy Hunt’s repeat of the 2p ploy promises political gains and losses https://t.co/s7Af5UH5FJ

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 预计英国财政大臣将于周三公布一份 "长期增长预算"，但预算责任办公室可能会下调对 2024 年经济增长的预测。
item.description:
The chancellor is expected to unveil a 'Budget for long-term growth' on Wednesday, but the Office for Budget Responsibility is likely to cut its forecasts for economic growth in 2024 https://t.co/AhxlumDct6 pic.twitter.com/1G3DtDDcZW

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 好戏上场了...首相问答刚刚开始，预算案将于 12:30 开始......关注 @FT 实时博客，获取突发新闻和无与伦比的专家分析👇。
item.description:
It's showtime... PMQs is just kicking off, with the Budget due to start at 12.30...

Follow the @FT live blog for breaking news and unrivalled expert analysis 👇https://t.co/ODPtxoZRNh

— Lucy Fisher (@LOS_Fisher) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）准备发布减税预算案之际，英国高收入者的可支配收入将出现有史以来的最大降幅，他希望这将挽救保守党在选举中的失败。
item.description:
The UK’s higher earners are on track for the biggest fall in their disposable income on record as Jeremy Hunt prepares to deliver a tax-cutting budget he hopes will save the Conservatives from electoral defeat https://t.co/Qw5cfuaY3s

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 伦敦大型股富时 100 指数（FTSE 100）和中型股富时 250 指数（FTSE 250）在英国预算案公布前表现乐观，追随欧洲其他地区的涨势
item.description:
London’s large-cap FTSE 100 and mid-cap FTSE 250 were upbeat ahead of the UK Budget, tracking gains elsewhere in Europe https://t.co/AhxlumDct6 pic.twitter.com/5OTYVxARBa

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）准备发布减税预算案之际，英国高收入者的可支配收入将出现有史以来的最大降幅，他希望这将挽救保守党在选举中的失败。
item.description:
The UK’s higher earners are on track for the biggest fall in their disposable income on record as Jeremy Hunt prepares to deliver a tax-cutting Budget he hopes will save the Conservatives from electoral defeat https://t.co/G2M8l5LAKq pic.twitter.com/TAugDEV9bj

item.title: 在英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）于今天中午发表重要的财政预算案演讲后，三位《金融时报》专家将回答您的问题。
item.description:
After chancellor Jeremy Hunt delivers his all-important Budget speech this lunchtime, three FT experts will be poised to answer your questions https://t.co/57FlW5FB2g

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 爆炸性新闻尼基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）决定结束她的总统竞选活动。此举结束了她在白宫的竞选活动，她的竞选活动超过了唐纳德-特朗普的所有其他共和党竞争对手，但却未能获得足够的支持来推翻这位前总统。
item.description:
Breaking news: Nikki Haley has decided to end her presidential campaign. The move caps a bid for the White House that outlasted all the other Republican rivals to Donald Trump but failed to gain enough support to topple the former president https://t.co/5bBEOYZoiw pic.twitter.com/v8LJh1MjI4

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 民意调查人员要小心，@SpiegelPeter 警告说...... "秘密的非特朗普共和党人 "就在你们中间
item.description:
Pollsters beware, warns @SpiegelPeter ... the "secret non Trump Republican" walks among you https://t.co/QUu4KalQVc

— Miranda Green (@greenmiranda) March 6, 2024

item.title: 预算日，我们将在现场回答您的问题将您的意见反馈给我（经济、公共财政、税收制度等）、@ClaerB（金钱的一切）、Blick Rothenberg 首席执行官 Nimesh Shah通过 @ft 在评论中提问
item.description:
Budget day and we are there to answer your questions

Put your comments to me (economy, public finances, tax system etc), @ClaerB (everything money), Nimesh Shah, chief executive of Blick Rothenberg

Questions in the commentshttps://t.co/OUdmXU0FjU via @ft

— Chris Giles (@ChrisGiles_) March 6, 2024

item.title: 就保守党内部争斗而言，之前的国民保险削减已经完成了任务，因为里希-苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）仍然是首相。阅读 @stephenkb 的《内部政治》时事通讯的更多内容
item.description:
In terms of the internal battle within the Tory party, the previous national insurance cut has done its job, in that Rishi Sunak is still prime minister.

Read more from @stephenkb’s Inside Politics newsletter https://t.co/siriV0rkck

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: Capita 公布亏损 1.07 亿英镑，股价暴跌
item.description:
Capita shares tumble as it reports £107mn loss https://t.co/lka82GkvYi

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 "超级星期二 "几乎所有举行共和党初选的州都取得了胜利，在这个夜晚，他几乎获得了该党的总统候选人提名，将在今年的白宫竞选中与乔-拜登（Joe Biden）对决：
item.description:
Donald Trump cruised to victory in nearly all of the states holding Republican primaries on Super Tuesday, on a night that took him to the brink of securing his party’s presidential nomination to face Joe Biden in this year’s White House race: https://t.co/Ub5S4fp1pr pic.twitter.com/M1wJLFPTE6

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 今天的预算案很可能是大选前的最后一次，因此政府将寄予厚望，希望它能有意义地改变公众舆论，使其对政府有利。但杰里米-亨特能做到吗？
item.description:
Today’s Budget is likely to be the last before a general election, so the government will have high hopes that it will meaningfully shift public opinion in its favour.

But can Jeremy Hunt deliver?https://t.co/BWvek95ORj pic.twitter.com/q41gTLdrqx

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 你是否想知道胡塞武装声称攻击 "英国"、"美国 "或 "以色列 "船只的说法有多准确？让我来向您介绍一下船只国籍的阴暗世界：
item.description:
Have you wondered how accurate the Houthis' claims to be attacking "British," "American" or "Israeli" ships are? Let me introduce you to the murky world of ships' nationalities: https://t.co/5SQApGRVyJ

— Robert Wright (@RKWinvisibleman) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观点唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 "超级星期二"（Super Tuesday）一举夺魁，但他吸引共和党选民的能力却明显低于预期。
item.description:
Opinion: Even as he romped to victory on Super Tuesday, Donald Trump has continued to show a striking ability to attract Republican voters at a significantly lower rate than anticipated https://t.co/CcUJfLbhLr pic.twitter.com/KrE3Na2tc1

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 我们对预算案了解多少？按照历史悠久的传统，今天的几项重要预算公告已经提前公布，从行业投资到养老金改革。点击此处了解更多信息：
item.description:
What do we know already about the Budget?

In time-honoured tradition, several of today’s important Budget announcements have been made ahead of time, from industry investment to pension reforms.

Find out more here: https://t.co/z2Jr2ec5hG pic.twitter.com/T38rVcpgvu

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024
